location.description: Nestled in the heart of Phimai, you'll enjoy the tranquility of open spaces while staying just minutes from the ancient Phimai Historical Park and the iconic Sai Ngam mangrove. Free bike rentals included for effortless exploration.

guide.title: Insider's Guide to Phimai
guide.subtitle: Discover the hidden gems, ancient temples, and local culture of this charming Thai town
guide.intro: Welcome to Phimai, a hidden gem in the heart of Thailand's Isaan region. This ancient town is home to one of the most important Khmer temples outside of Cambodia, surrounded by lush landscapes and warm local hospitality.

gettingAround.title: Getting Around Phimai
gettingAround.description: Phimai is a compact town perfect for walking and cycling. Our free bike rentals make it easy to explore all the attractions at your own pace.

bestTime.title: Best Time to Visit
bestTime.description: Phimai is beautiful year-round, but the cool season (November to February) offers the most pleasant weather for exploring. The rainy season brings lush greenery, while the hot season is perfect for early morning temple visits.
